name: The Marion
description:
The Marion is a freight hauler and a family business. Engineered by Mina Somera, manned by her step-brother Liam, and captained by her step-father Raymond, the ship makes runs between Dylan Station and Rawling Homestead.

Mina aspires to little else than sitting at the Marion's helm, but a stranger on the docks of Dylan Station has other plans.

The Marion is a Twine game and, as such, is a completely text-based game. Dialogue spoken by Mina (you) is colored blue. At times, you will have the opportunity to choose from a number of different responses.
